# Brian Wong

 

[City Council](https://www.lafayetteco.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=23)  
Title: Mayor Pro Tem  
Phone: 720-236-3696  
[Contact Brian Wong](https://www.lafayetteco.gov/formcenter/Contact-Us-4/Contact-City-Council-or-Individual-Counc-171)

Brian Wong was elected to serve a 2 year term in November 2019. He was re-elected in 2021 for a 4 year term. He was elected Mayor Pro Tem in 2021. Mayor Pro Tem Wong was re-elected in 2023 and also re-elected as Mayor Pro Tem in 2023.

Mayor Pro Tem Wong serves on the following Committees

- Denver Regional Council of Governments (DRCOG)
- Consortium of Cities
- Northwest Parkway Public Highway Authority - Alternate
- Northwest Mayors &amp; Commissioners Coalition (formerly US 36)
- Chamber of Commerce
